LABEL: 0x1D3
STRING: We returned to the others, but the preparations for the operation weren't over yet.

LABEL: 0x215
STRING: This time, Yukari, Hiragino, and I would head to the warehouse on the first floor.

LABEL: 0x26E
STRING: 「Are we really... going to do this?」

LABEL: 0x2A1
STRING: 「I'm sorry, but should we wear a mask or something...?」

LABEL: 0x2E6
STRING: Hiragino was at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x302
STRING: Yukari tried to make a constructive suggestion despite her twitching.

LABEL: 0x33C
STRING: The danger of being attacked by <COOS> hadn't disappeared yet――

LABEL: 0x378
STRING: However, we had to head to the warehouse to carry out this operation.

LABEL: 0x3B8
STRING: And Yukari wouldn't let me go out alone to the hallways, no matter what.

LABEL: 0x412
STRING: Even she was at a loss for words at the current situation.

LABEL: 0x44E
STRING: No matter how anyone reacted, the truth in front of us wouldn't change.

LABEL: 0x498
STRING: A mountain of cardboard towered before us.

LABEL: 0x4D8
STRING: And the name written on said cardboard was――

LABEL: 0x5A6
STRING: 「Dividing Dry...!」

LABEL: 0x5D6
STRING: That abominable liquid...

LABEL: 0x5FA
STRING: Yes, this mountain of cardboard boxes was packed full of Dividing Dry.

LABEL: 0x662
STRING: What Reiri wanted was not the liquid itself,

LABEL: 0x6AC
STRING: but the plastic bottles containing it.

LABEL: 0x6DA
STRING: So, our mission now was to empty all of these bottles of their contents.

LABEL: 0x748
STRING: I had a sense of foreboding about this...

LABEL: 0x83F
STRING: 「Hey, do we really need to empty all of these?」

LABEL: 0x88A
STRING: 「Surely not...」

LABEL: 0x8B4
STRING: 「Wouldn't two boxes be enough?」

LABEL: 0x8F8
STRING: Indeed.

LABEL: 0x90E
STRING: Reiri had told us to bring all of them, but even she must not have expected this amount.

LABEL: 0x95C
STRING: Why was there so much Dividing Dry on this ship...?

LABEL: 0x9B4
STRING: 「Well, let's start with two boxes for now...」

LABEL: 0xA59
STRING: 「In here?」

LABEL: 0xA7C
STRING: At Hiragino's words, my hands stopped moving as I was grabbing a bottle.

LABEL: 0xABE
STRING: Even if I never wanted to drink this thing again, just pouring it all on the floor felt wrong.

LABEL: 0xB98
STRING: 「It'll weigh on my conscience.」

LABEL: 0xC1F
STRING: 「Let's empty them in the sink above. You can carry two boxes with you, right?」

LABEL: 0xCA3
STRING: Saying that, she opened the door of the warehouse and checked the front.

LABEL: 0xCEA
STRING: 「The way is clear. Now's our chance.」

LABEL: 0xD2D
STRING: 「Sure...」

LABEL: 0xD66
STRING: Hiragino still looked somewhat sick, but lifted his box with no problems.

LABEL: 0xDC4
STRING: More easily than me, at least, the very picture of health...

LABEL: 0xDF4
STRING: Grraah!

LABEL: 0xE0A
STRING: 「All right, let's go.」

LABEL: 0xE28
STRING: As soon as I said that, we exited the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x1241
STRING: 「W-Wow, that's amazing...」

LABEL: 0x1268
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x1282
STRING: We made it back to the crew room on the second floor.

LABEL: 0x12A6
STRING: Touri marveled at the piles of Dividing Dry.

LABEL: 0x1328
STRING: Even Reiri beside her was wide-eyed, though she didn't make a sound.

LABEL: 0x13A0
STRING: 「Okay, let's find some more space.」

LABEL: 0x13C6
STRING: I had to put all these down somewhere...

LABEL: 0x13EC
STRING: If Tokiwa were here, she'd probably get mad at us for wasting the drinks.

LABEL: 0x1434
STRING: ...Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x144E
STRING: When we went down to the warehouse on the first floor, I tried to check the other side of the bridge.

LABEL: 0x14A2
STRING: The place where we met that "light."

LABEL: 0x14CA
STRING: The place where we parted ways with Tokiwa――

LABEL: 0x14F0
STRING: Yukari hadn't allowed it, however.

LABEL: 0x159D
STRING: 「No matter what you find, nothing will come of it.」

LABEL: 0x15D5
STRING: 「I understand how you feel, but... now's not the time.」

LABEL: 0x161E
STRING: She hadn't said it was reckless, but the reason she had stopped me was obvious.

LABEL: 0x16CE
STRING: Seeing that scene again, I wondered if Hiragino would have been able to do something.

LABEL: 0x171C
STRING: Would he have been able to keep his composure?

LABEL: 0x17A5
STRING: ...That must be one of the reasons Yukari followed him to the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x18B6
STRING: Wait for me, Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x18DA
STRING: I'll be there to save you...

LABEL: 0x18FC
STRING: I piled up another empty bottle.

LABEL: 0x198D
STRING: 「So, what do we do now?」

LABEL: 0x1A21
STRING: 「You'll have to ask her.」

LABEL: 0x1A6A
STRING: We had left a pile of plastic bottles and PDAs behind in the library.

LABEL: 0x1AB3
STRING: We had all the things we needed.

LABEL: 0x1AD9
STRING: Reiri, who had been looking downward with her eyes closed, raised her head.

LABEL: 0x1B83
STRING: 「We'll use the plastic bottles as rafts and strap the PDAs to them.」

LABEL: 0x1BC0
STRING: 「And then, we'll flush them from the third floor.」

LABEL: 0x1BFA
STRING: 「Flush them...? But how?」

LABEL: 0x1C3D
STRING: 「We'll use the sprinklers.」

LABEL: 0x1C5F
STRING: 「It's a serious matter to start a fire in a closed space like this submarine.」

LABEL: 0x1C9D
STRING: 「The ship is equipped with sprinklers all over the place...」

LABEL: 0x1D44
STRING: 「As you know well, Nee-san.」

LABEL: 0x1D7D
STRING: The strategy she came up with was simple.

LABEL: 0x1DA5
STRING: But it almost felt like... she was underestimating the situation.

LABEL: 0x1DF1
STRING: Would it really work out fine?

LABEL: 0x1E1F
STRING: What if we managed to flush the PDAs down to the second floor from the third, but they stopped there?

LABEL: 0x1F52
STRING: 「Will we be able to get them down to the first floor like we want?」

LABEL: 0x1F90
STRING: 「Even if we use the sprinklers, I think they'll just get stuck somewhere along the way...」

LABEL: 0x200A
STRING: 「Don't tell me you haven't noticed?」

LABEL: 0x2038
STRING: 「――This ship is tilting.」

LABEL: 0x2062
STRING: 「Only slightly, so I don't blame you for not noticing.」

LABEL: 0x20BA
STRING: 「But, it should be enough for a raft traveling down the spiral staircase on the surface of the water.」

LABEL: 0x2129
STRING: The <SHEEP III> was tilting...

LABEL: 0x2152
STRING: It was not surprising when you thought about it.

LABEL: 0x2182
STRING: There was no way that a sunken ship would remain level.

LABEL: 0x21BE
STRING: I had forgotten about it since the <SHEEP III> happened to land almost horizontally, but it made sense there would be some tilting.

LABEL: 0x2263
STRING: The fact that the water pooled differently on the floor must have been because of that as well.

LABEL: 0x2339
STRING: 「So that's how we're going to round them all up!」

LABEL: 0x236C
STRING: Reiri nodded.

LABEL: 0x23A0
STRING: Touri happily clapped two plastic bottles against each other.

LABEL: 0x2452
STRING: 「I've already procured the tools for an experiment.」

LABEL: 0x2484
STRING: 「We need to find out where the flow ends up.」

LABEL: 0x24D3
STRING: In other words――

LABEL: 0x24F3
STRING: Someone had to leave this room again and subject themselves to the threat of <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x254D
STRING: Yukari frowned, as expected.

LABEL: 0x2642
STRING: 「I don't like the idea of going outside over and over again, but...」

LABEL: 0x267E
STRING: 「I understand that it's necessary.」

LABEL: 0x26D9
STRING: 「I know it's dangerous.」

LABEL: 0x2700
STRING: Reiri spoke in a low voice.

LABEL: 0x2720
STRING: Her complexion darkened.

LABEL: 0x27AE
STRING: 「We can't win this one by half measures.」

LABEL: 0x27E4
STRING: 「We all know how dangerous <COOS> can be.」

LABEL: 0x28AE
STRING: 「Since we don't have an effective countermeasure, as few people as possible should go...」

LABEL: 0x28F5
STRING: That was the greatest compromise Yukari could make while trying to protect as many as possible.

LABEL: 0x2971
STRING: And given each person's aptitude and compatibility...

LABEL: 0x29AF
STRING: In the end, Reiri and I ended up going outside again.

LABEL: 0x2A57
STRING: This was the third time now...

LABEL: 0x2A7A
STRING: "It's dangerous," she said, but here we were again.

LABEL: 0x2AB0
STRING: Reiri had told me to be her arms and legs, and apparently, she had been serious.

LABEL: 0x2B02
STRING: I didn't know if it was my place to say this, but she was working me like I really were her limbs.

LABEL: 0x2B4E
STRING: It sounded nicer if I thought that I was being relied on, but...

LABEL: 0x2B93
STRING: 「Now then, the experiment. Look.」

LABEL: 0x2BC4
STRING: We stepped out into the hallway and stopped just a short distance away from the crew room.

LABEL: 0x2C0A
STRING: There was a sprinkler near us on the ceiling.

LABEL: 0x2C38
STRING: Reiri took out an empty test tube and began mixing some sort of liquid and powder.

LABEL: 0x2C90
STRING: 「What the hell are you――」

LABEL: 0x2CBD
STRING: 「Just give me a second.」

LABEL: 0x2CEA
STRING: After a few seconds, Reiri handed the test tube over to me.

LABEL: 0x2D9A
STRING: 「Bring this close to the sprinkler.」

LABEL: 0x2DDF
STRING: 「...I can't reach it.」

LABEL: 0x2E12
STRING: 「Can't help it then...」

LABEL: 0x2E8F
STRING: 「Carry me on your shoulders.」

LABEL: 0x2EAE
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x2EC4
STRING: I stood before her, confused.

LABEL: 0x2EF8
STRING: Was this... something we had to do?

LABEL: 0x2F22
STRING: Was there no other way?

LABEL: 0x2F83
STRING: 「Just support me properly, okay?」

LABEL: 0x2FB0
STRING: 「Yeah, sure...」

LABEL: 0x2FD9
STRING: 「I won't forgive you if you drop me!」

LABEL: 0x300C
STRING: Why did I have to be showered with insults from above...?

LABEL: 0x3056
STRING: I might have done this once or twice before with a relative's child, but...

LABEL: 0x30A1
STRING: Having to carry her on my shoulders like this was not something I had expected.

LABEL: 0x30E1
STRING: Her body was surprisingly light.

LABEL: 0x3109
STRING: If I held her legs like this, it felt like there was no way she would fall off my shoulders.

LABEL: 0x3169
STRING: As if she was holding on to only the bare minimum that she needed to live.

LABEL: 0x31A1
STRING: Or, on the contrary, even things that were normally necessary for others, she would discard.

LABEL: 0x31E9
STRING: This kind of lightness made me feel uneasy, but...

LABEL: 0x322A
STRING: 「Okay, it's done.」

LABEL: 0x324D
STRING: Reiri's voice.

LABEL: 0x32A1
STRING: 「Ugh――」

LABEL: 0x32BB
STRING: The emergency bell began ringing in response.

LABEL: 0x32E9
STRING: As I braced myself, water started pouring down from above.

LABEL: 0x331D
STRING: 「Are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x334E
STRING: 「The sprinklers went off just as planned.」

LABEL: 0x3388
STRING: 「Of course I'm okay.」

LABEL: 0x33B9
STRING: Her voice was insolent, contrary to my worries.

LABEL: 0x33DD
STRING: Reiri's upper body was completely wet as I lowered her down from my shoulders, however.

LABEL: 0x3423
STRING: Her shirt stuck to her already thin body, making her look even more fragile.

LABEL: 0x34D1
STRING: 「I mixed hydrochloric acid and baking soda to produce carbon dioxide.」

LABEL: 0x3512
STRING: 「Carbon dioxide?」

LABEL: 0x353F
STRING: 「Yeah. As the concentration increases, the sprinklers will malfunction.」

LABEL: 0x3586
STRING: She explained to me under the rain.

LABEL: 0x35E2
STRING: Soon, I heard footsteps rushing toward us from far away.

LABEL: 0x360E
STRING: It was Yukari who had heard the bell and had come running.

LABEL: 0x370D
STRING: 「――What are you doing?!」

LABEL: 0x374A
STRING: 「An experiment, as I told you.」

LABEL: 0x37C7
STRING: 「――Here, look.」

LABEL: 0x3828
STRING: A puddle was forming at our feet.

LABEL: 0x384C
STRING: Eventually, it began to flow like a river.

LABEL: 0x387C
STRING: Reiri took an empty ampoule from her pocket and set it on the flowing water.

LABEL: 0x38D7
STRING: 「Let's follow it.」

LABEL: 0x3BCB
STRING: A flooded hallway.

LABEL: 0x3BE7
STRING: Was the water somewhat deeper than on the second and third floors?

LABEL: 0x3C1F
STRING: I could feel the flow of water through my shoes as I walked onward.

LABEL: 0x3C6C
STRING: 「Walk with the flow.」

LABEL: 0x3C94
STRING: 「Look down and follow it... Don't lose sight of it.」

LABEL: 0x3CD5
STRING: A voice was whispering in my ear.

LABEL: 0x3CF1
STRING: My back had become a natural position for Reiri to find herself in.

LABEL: 0x3D2D
STRING: Actually, I'd just gotten used to carrying her on my back.

LABEL: 0x3D73
STRING: I wonder what it was... Judging by her words alone, it might look like we got along fine.

LABEL: 0x3DBB
STRING: Yukari kept an eye on our surroundings while I walked forward with my eyes on the floor.

LABEL: 0x3DF5
STRING: It wasn't impossible,

LABEL: 0x3E21
STRING: but I probably wouldn't be able to sense the presence of <COOS> while following the ampoule.

LABEL: 0x3E87
STRING: So, I was glad Yukari came along with us.

LABEL: 0x3EB5
STRING: Feeling relieved, I chased after the ampoule.

LABEL: 0x3EE1
STRING: While following the ampoule as it leisurely flowed downstream...

LABEL: 0x3F37
STRING: ...It reminded me of how I used to play with bamboo boats near a river when I was a kid.

LABEL: 0x3FD6
STRING: I would always lose sight of the boat before long.

LABEL: 0x401A
STRING: As a kid, I always wondered where the disappearing bamboo boats were heading.

LABEL: 0x4070
STRING: It was a nostalgic memory.

LABEL: 0x40B8
STRING: Now that I was an adult, I could keep up with the speed of the flow.

LABEL: 0x40F6
STRING: ――I wouldn't lose sight of it anymore.

LABEL: 0x418D
STRING: The ampoule eventually came to a stop.

LABEL: 0x41C7
STRING: This was the end of the line...

LABEL: 0x41E5
STRING: Reiri and Yukari also noticed that the flow had stopped.

LABEL: 0x422A
STRING: 「This is... the place, right?」

LABEL: 0x425D
STRING: 「This was a rudimentary way to go about it, though.」

LABEL: 0x4286
STRING: Having said that, Reiri got off my back and picked up the ampoule.

LABEL: 0x42D0
STRING: At that moment――

LABEL: 0x4365
STRING: I felt like I saw a light.

LABEL: 0x438F
STRING: Light with legs.

LABEL: 0x43AB
STRING: A familiar luminescent pattern.

LABEL: 0x43CF
STRING: And colors that I would never get used to seeing.

LABEL: 0x44ED
STRING: 「Watch out, Reiri...!」

LABEL: 0x450F
STRING: I pushed her to the side.

LABEL: 0x45C8
STRING: The lightweight Reiri fell to the floor easily.

LABEL: 0x4610
STRING: Droplets of water flew up in the air.

LABEL: 0x462E
STRING: The light, having lost sight of its initial target, didn't stop and continued to move straight toward me.

LABEL: 0x46F1
STRING: It was approaching me.

LABEL: 0x4709
STRING: I thought for less than a second.

LABEL: 0x473A
STRING: Where to dodge?

LABEL: 0x4756
STRING: To the right, or to the left...? No.

LABEL: 0x4776
STRING: If I dodged here――

LABEL: 0x4796
STRING: The light would go for Yukari behind me.

LABEL: 0x4853
STRING: 「Watch out...! Avoid it!!」

LABEL: 0x4882
STRING: Yukari shouted.

LABEL: 0x489A
STRING: To dodge, or not to dodge.

LABEL: 0x48BA
STRING: My mind was torn between the two options.

LABEL: 0x48E2
STRING: They both clashed, and――

LABEL: 0x4920
STRING: Just before the light reached my feet,

LABEL: 0x493E
STRING: I jumped back.

LABEL: 0x49BD
STRING: 「Yukari-san!」

LABEL: 0x49D7
STRING: When I looked back, Yukari had already retreated backward.

LABEL: 0x4A11
STRING: However, the light didn't stop.

LABEL: 0x4A46
STRING: 「Hii――」

LABEL: 0x4A65
STRING: <COOS> continued its ceaseless advance.

LABEL: 0x4A9B
STRING: We couldn't keep this up.

LABEL: 0x4ABD
STRING: We had to stop it.

LABEL: 0x4ADD
STRING: But how――

LABEL: 0x4B01
STRING: 「Of course... Light!」

LABEL: 0x4B1F
STRING: My flashlight rolled beside me.

LABEL: 0x4B47
STRING: I turned on the flashlight and threw it in the direction of the attackers.

LABEL: 0x4B9B
STRING: For a brief moment, their attention turned to it.

LABEL: 0x4BD1
STRING: But, it didn't last long.

LABEL: 0x4BFB
STRING: It served only as a brief distraction.

LABEL: 0x4C1F
STRING: The light was soon moving toward us again.

LABEL: 0x4CC3
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!!」

LABEL: 0x4CE6
STRING: Yukari shouted again.

LABEL: 0x4D00
STRING: I dodged <COOS> and ran toward her――

LABEL: 0x4D34
STRING: However...

LABEL: 0x4D50
STRING: Turning around, I saw Reiri collapsed beside me.

LABEL: 0x4D7C
STRING: She stood up, supporting her head, which had been hit hard.

LABEL: 0x4DBC
STRING: ――I couldn't leave her behind.

LABEL: 0x4DEC
STRING: 「Yukari-san, go!」

LABEL: 0x4E0E
STRING: 「We'll meet up later.」

LABEL: 0x4E3B
STRING: 「...It's a promise!」

LABEL: 0x4E62
STRING: With that, Yukari turned around and ran.

LABEL: 0x4E8A
STRING: Alright――

LABEL: 0x4EA0
STRING: I faced the luminescent creature again in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x4F4B
STRING: The creature slowly closed the distance between us, cornering us against the wall.

LABEL: 0x4F91
STRING: At this rate...

LABEL: 0x4FAF
STRING: We had to escape somewhere――

LABEL: 0x4FDF
STRING: I groped around and found a door.

LABEL: 0x5007
STRING: This was the door that Tokiwa couldn't open when she hit it earlier...

LABEL: 0x504B
STRING: ――There was a spot that glowed green in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x508F
STRING: I immediately held up my keycard and tried opening the door.

LABEL: 0x50DE
STRING: It opened!

LABEL: 0x51C5
STRING: 「Uooooh!!」

LABEL: 0x51EE
STRING: 「Uwaaah!」

LABEL: 0x522E
STRING: While holding the still-staggering Reiri, I lugged her inside, jumped through the door, and closed it.

LABEL: 0x5292
STRING: Were we safe...?

LABEL: 0x52B0
STRING: I groped around the pitch-black room, searching for Reiri.

LABEL: 0x5302
STRING: 「Are you alright, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x5333
STRING: 「...I hit my head.」

LABEL: 0x535A
STRING: 「...Is it bad?」

LABEL: 0x5389
STRING: 「It hurts...」

LABEL: 0x53A8
STRING: She hit me on the back as she said it.

LABEL: 0x53E4
STRING: She'd be fine, I guess...

LABEL: 0x540E
STRING: 「I can't see anything.」

LABEL: 0x543D
STRING: 「You threw our flashlight away just now.」

LABEL: 0x5465
STRING: 「I don't have any light sources on me.」

LABEL: 0x5498
STRING: 「Me neither...」

LABEL: 0x54B4
STRING: ――No, there was something!

LABEL: 0x54E2
STRING: I clicked the watch on my left wrist.

LABEL: 0x5516
STRING: My watch had broken back when the sinking happened.

LABEL: 0x5540
STRING: But, the battery should still be fine...

LABEL: 0x55DF
STRING: I managed to turn on the backlight, and a dim glow illuminated our surroundings.

LABEL: 0x5613
STRING: 「All right.」

LABEL: 0x5629
STRING: Now we had some light.

LABEL: 0x5643
STRING: We should be okay until the battery ran out.

LABEL: 0x5673
STRING: Who knows how long it'd last, though...

LABEL: 0x56B9
STRING: I used my watch to illuminate the far side of the room.

LABEL: 0x56EB
STRING: From what I could see, it looked like there were stairs going down one meter ahead of me.

LABEL: 0x5725
STRING: The space at the top of the stairs was very small... I was glad I didn't walk around here carelessly.

LABEL: 0x577E
STRING: 「Let's go down. There's no point in staying here.」

LABEL: 0x581D
STRING: Doing just that, we slowly descended the stairs and came out into a wide space.

LABEL: 0x5863
STRING: "Wide" may be the wrong word.

LABEL: 0x5899
STRING: It was true that the wall-less space that stretched out before us looked wide,

LABEL: 0x58D7
STRING: but there were pipes extending and intersecting from all directions around us.

LABEL: 0x592B
STRING: 「Where are we...?」

LABEL: 0x5958
STRING: 「――This is the steam room.」
